item.title: Thank You For Submitting!
item.description: I will get back to you as soon as I can. In the meantime, I’d appreciate a follow on twitter If you want to check out more of my open source activity, follow me on github

item.title: How to remove all expired keys from your keyring
item.description: How can we remove our expired keys from our keyring? In this post I’m going to briefly cover how to purge all expired and revoked keys from your keyring using gpg2. Tl;Dr gpg2 --list-public-keys --with-colons | grep -a '^pub:[re]:' | cut -d : -f5 | xargs -l gpg --batch --yes --delete-keys Prerequisite knowledge If you’re reading this post I’m assuming your well-versed enough to be able to use pgp keys fluidly to encrypt and sign data.

item.title: About
item.description: My name’s Alex and welcome to my little corner of the internet! I write tech posts on what I discover while going down the info sec rabbit hole. So check out my blog if you want to go down that rabbit hole with me! During the work week, I’m building web apps for my clients. You can see the links to my work below: Projects Github Page Resume When I’m away from my computer, I’m MOST LIKELY eating with friends and family, playing video games, or teaching yoga.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Feel free to email me here to inquire about my development services. Here is my public key as well for those who need it. Besides that, my DM’s are always open via twitter @alEXE_tech.

item.title: Projects
item.description: jsRadio A Radio Interface to play the top 50 hits from the Radio World API PolyCrypto A Polybar script written in js to get Bitcoin price updates
